channel.title: Anarchy-Ps [Best RSPS EVER!]
channel.description:
[i][b]Anarchy-Ps[/b][/i] :D
Forums: [url=http://forums.anarchy-ps.com]forums.anarchy-ps.com[/url] Play: [url=http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/anarchy/Anarchy.jar]dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/anarchy/Anarchy.jar[/url]
[U][B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/B][/U]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"][B][I] - New home at Yanille. - Highscores system. - Vote system. - 24/7 VPS. - Great invison forum. - New login box + login button. - Tormented demon + loots. - Experience lamp added with no issue of engines. - Low/High alchemy -> Anti-bot. - Bonecrusher system (auto bury dropped bones). - Dwarven rock cake lower hp -1 per click. - Auto Joining Help clan chat on log in. - Only staff can use mod before their username. - Prestige points exchange. - Mystery box give randoms prize, buy in prestige store. - New rank icons. - Administrator menu in option tab. - Prestige system + shop. - Player informations interface. - All monster attack + death emotes. - Frost dragon + loots. - Transparent context menus. - Nomad boss + loots (chaotic weapons). - Hunter skill + Hunter zone. - Perfect achievement system. - New information tab. - Custom achievement tab from information tab. - Staff list on infomartion tab. - Players can now change the password from the into tab. - New achievements added. - Hunter experience increased. - Loot cash from every impling. - Donator Island. - Grand Exchange - Flawless party room - Lottery - Dicing - Multiple world support - Cross-world player list support - Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) - Flawless duel arena, with staking - Flawless shopping system - Flawless banking system, with searching. - Flawless farming system - PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc - Rank Icon changing system - Flawless loyalty title system - Flawless donator system - Refined item definition system - New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. - Event schedule system - New character file system (credits to Lin for the format) - Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally) - Perfect curse system - Weapon combination selection in duel arena - Advanced MySQL system[/I][/B][/COLOR]
[U][B][SIZE=4]Medias[/SIZE][/B][/U]
[img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/22%20Skills_zpsevjkb5fj.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/vote%20store_zpspiq56oao.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/prestige_zpsrd39telx.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/torm_zpsjutm7orh.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/skill_zpsu2q1syte.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/nomad_zpszpzlksbz.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/corp_zpsxeplf5dm.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/GE_zpsngjq6jvt.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/info_zpsuujdauj7.png[/img] [img]http://i1187.photobucket.com/albums/z395/maximebasque/Anarchy/Info%20achie_zpsgt8zngc4.png[/img] :)

item.title: Anarchy-Ps [Best RSPS EVER!]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Soulcist:

This looks pretty generic to be honest.

Pretty much agree with this however, I like that name changing feature. Good luck!

item.title: Anarchy-Ps [Best RSPS EVER!]
item.dc:creator: @maximebasque maximebasque
item.description:
@maximebasque wrote:

Anarchy-Ps

Forums: forums.anarchy-ps.com
Play: dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/43849483/anarchy/Anarchy.jar

[U][B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/B][/U]

[COLOR="#00FFFF"][B][I]

  • New home at Yanille.
  • Highscores system.
  • Vote system.
  • 24/7 VPS.
  • Great invison forum.
  • New login box + login button.
  • Tormented demon + loots.
  • Experience lamp added with no issue of engines.
  • Low/High alchemy -> Anti-bot.
  • Bonecrusher system (auto bury dropped bones).
  • Dwarven rock cake lower hp -1 per click.
  • Auto Joining Help clan chat on log in.
  • Only staff can use mod before their username.
  • Prestige points exchange.
  • Mystery box give randoms prize, buy in prestige store.
  • New rank icons.
  • Administrator menu in option tab.
  • Prestige system + shop.
  • Player informations interface.
  • All monster attack + death emotes.
  • Frost dragon + loots.
  • Transparent context menus.
  • Nomad boss + loots (chaotic weapons).
  • Hunter skill + Hunter zone.
  • Perfect achievement system.
  • New information tab.
  • Custom achievement tab from information tab.
  • Staff list on infomartion tab.
  • Players can now change the password from the into tab.
  • New achievements added.
  • Hunter experience increased.
  • Loot cash from every impling.
  • Donator Island.
  • Grand Exchange
  • Flawless party room
  • Lottery
  • Dicing
  • Multiple world support
  • Cross-world player list support
  • Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently)
  • Flawless duel arena, with staking
  • Flawless shopping system
  • Flawless banking system, with searching.
  • Flawless farming system
  • PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc
  • Rank Icon changing system
  • Flawless loyalty title system
  • Flawless donator system
  • Refined item definition system
  • New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc.
  • Event schedule system
  • New character file system (credits to Lin for the format)
  • Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally)
  • Perfect curse system
  • Weapon combination selection in duel arena
  • Advanced MySQL system[/I][/B][/COLOR]

[U][B][SIZE=4]Medias[/SIZE][/B][/U]










Read full topic
